sentences: Kõrtsimees ulatas pudeleid, kallas kortleid ja valmistas aanispitse.
context: The word 'võtame' is the first person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'võtta', which means 'to take'. It can also be used in contexts where it implies making, doing, or throwing something. In this context from K.A. Hindrey's text, it appears to be part of a list of actions: Võtame (we take), teeme (we make), viskame (we throw) - suggesting an informal, conversational tone.
